name: NCAA March Madness 2004
synopsis: NCAA March Madness 2004 storms the court with new schools, smoother control, and a deep Dynasty Mode.  Take your school's team through the Maui Invitational preseason tournament all the way to the Big Dance.  The unique, fast-paced college game comes to life with players applying full-court pressure "D," diving on loose balls, and throwing it down big-time.  You can even hoop it up in an online tournament.  NCAA March Madness 2004 delivers the strategy, emotion, and passion that is college basketball.
